statements: SELECT * FROM legal_documents_refugee_status;
SELECT document_id, document_type FROM legal_documents_refugee_status WHERE refugee_status = 'Approved';
SELECT refugee_name, refugee_status FROM legal_documents_refugee_status WHERE refugee_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM legal_documents_refugee_status;
SELECT document_content FROM legal_documents_refugee_status WHERE refugee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM legal_documents_refugee_status WHERE refugee_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT document_type, document_content FROM legal_documents_refugee_status WHERE refugee_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY document_type ASC;
SELECT refugee_name, refugee_status FROM legal_documents_refugee_status WHERE refugee_status = 'Granted' AND document_type LIKE '%permit%';
SELECT * FROM legal_documents_refugee_status WHERE refugee_status IN ('Pending', 'In Review') ORDER BY refugee_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT refugee_name FROM legal_documents_refugee_status WHERE document_type = 'Identification Card';
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM legal_documents;
SELECT refugee_name, refugee_country_of_origin FROM refugee_status WHERE refugee_status='Refugee';
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type='Agreement';
SELECT refugee_name, refugee_country_of_origin, date_of_entry FROM refugee_status ORDER BY date_of_entry DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_type, LENGTH(document_content) AS content_length FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM legal_documents;
SELECT refugee_id, refugee_name, refugee_country_of_origin FROM refugee_status WHERE refugee_status = 'asylum';
SELECT document_name, document_type, LENGTH(document_content) AS content_length FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Contract' ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT refugee_name, refugee_country_of_origin, DATE(date_of_entry) AS entry_date FROM refugee_status WHERE refugee_country_of_origin = 'Syria';
SELECT DISTINCT refugee_country_of_origin FROM refugee_status ORDER BY refugee_country_of_origin;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_title, document_type FROM legal_documents;
SELECT refugee_name, refugee_country_of_origin FROM refugee_information;
SELECT document_title, document_type, document_content FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Agreement';
SELECT aid_amount, aid_provided FROM legal_aid WHERE aid_provided = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_title, document_type FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Contract';
SELECT document_id, document_title FROM legal_documents ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT refugee_name, refugee_country_of_origin FROM refugee_information WHERE refugee_country_of_origin LIKE 'Syria%';
SELECT aid_id, aid_provided, aid_amount FROM legal_aid WHERE aid_provided = TRUE AND aid_amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY aid_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_content FROM legal_documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT refugee_name, country_of_origin FROM refugee_status ORDER BY refugee_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, location, contact_number FROM legal_aid_providers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT referral_id, referral_date, referral_status FROM referrals WHERE referral_status = 'Pending';
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM legal_documents;
SELECT provider_name, location, contact_number FROM legal_aid_providers;
SELECT refugee_name, country_of_origin, status FROM refugee_status;
SELECT document_name, document_content, provider_name FROM legal_documents INNER JOIN legal_aid_providers ON legal_documents.document_id = legal_aid_providers.provider_id;
SELECT provider_name, location, contact_number, referral_date FROM legal_aid_providers INNER JOIN referrals ON legal_aid_providers.provider_id = referrals.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM RefugeeInformation;
SELECT refugee_name, refugee_country FROM RefugeeInformation WHERE refugee_country = 'Syria';
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM LegalAidProviders ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT request_type, request_status FROM LegalAidRequests WHERE request_status = 'pending';
SELECT request_id, request_type FROM LegalAidRequests WHERE request_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Passport';
SELECT refugee_name, refugee_country FROM RefugeeInformation WHERE refugee_country = 'Syria' ORDER BY refugee_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM LegalAidProviders WHERE provider_location = 'New York' ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT request_id, request_type, request_status FROM LegalAidRequests WHERE request_status = 'Pending';

SELECT a.application_id, r.request_type, p.provider_name FROM RefugeeLegalAid a JOIN LegalAidRequests r ON a.request_id = r.request_id JOIN LegalAidProviders p ON a.provider_id = p.provider_id WHERE a.application_date > '2022-01-01';
